dependencies.description: GitPython is a python library used to interact with Git repositories.
dependencies.name: py-gitpython

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description:
Library to implement a well-behaved Unix daemon process. This library
implements the well-behaved daemon specification of PEP Standard daemon
process. A well-behaved Unix daemon process is tricky to get right, but
the required steps are much the same for every daemon program. A
DaemonContext instance holds the behaviour and configured process
environment for the program; use the instance as a context manager to
enter a daemon state.
dependencies.name: py-python-daemon

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
The setproctitle module allows a process to change its title (as
displayed by system tools such as ps and top).
dependencies.name: py-setproctitle

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
The SCINE database module is a database wrapper for a MongoDB encoding
reaction networks.
dependencies.name: scine-database

dependencies.description: Chemoinformatics toolkit with support for inorganic molecules.
dependencies.name: scine-molassembler

dependencies.description:
ReaDuct allows you to carry out structure optimizations, transition
state searches and intrinsic reaction coordinate (IRC) calculations
among other things
dependencies.name: scine-readuct

dependencies.description: Contains functionality which is used in most SCINE modules.
dependencies.name: scine-utilities
